koohiiStory1: The CATALPA is the tree that bears the SPICY Indian bean (NOTE - The Catalpa is also known as the "Indian Bean" due to the bean pods that grow from it).
koohiiStory2: The caterpillar´s favorite tree is the catalpa because it tastes spicy.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You make a tree spicy by turning it into a wood block print. The spice comes from all the porn you put on there. What? It wasn't me. Porn wood blocks have been around for ages!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine the journey a tree took to become a spicy wood block. MmMmm.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You make these wood blocks using a zoo saw (あずさ) because a regular saw can't handle how spicy these wood blocks are gonna get once they're covered in dirty pictures.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine using a zoo saw to cut the blocks out of a tree that you're going to spice up with awesome smut.

梓字的基本解释

梓
zǐ
落叶乔木。木材可供建筑及制造器物之用：梓器（棺材）。梓宫（皇帝的棺材）。
治木器：梓人（古代制造器具的木工）。梓匠。
木头雕刻成印刷用的木板：付梓（把稿件交付排印）。梓行（x妌g ）。
指故里：梓里。桑梓。
姓。

梓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zǐ］
［《廣韻》即里切，上止，精。］
亦作“杍1”。亦作“榟1”。
(1)木名。紫葳科，落叶乔木。叶子对生或三枚轮生。花黄白色。木质优良，轻软，耐朽，供建筑及制家具、乐器等用。
(2)古代七种木工之一。亦泛指木工。
(3)饮器。
(4)印书的雕版。因雕版以梓木为上，故称。后泛指制版印刷。
(5)指儿子。
(6)故乡的代称。
(7)古地名。在今四川省三台县一带。
(8)姓。春秋鲁国有梓慎。见《左传·昭公十八年》。

梓字的英文翻译

◎ 梓
catalpa

梓字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　梓； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页528第25
【唐韻】卽里切【集韻】【正韻】祖似切【韻會】祖士切，?音耔。【說文】楸也。或作?、榟。【通志】梓與楸相似。【爾雅·釋木】椅，梓。【郭註】卽楸。【陸璣·草木疏】楸之疏理白色而生子者爲梓。【埤雅】梓爲百木長，故呼梓爲木王。羅願云：屋室有此木，則餘材皆不震。　又橋梓。【尚書·大傳】橋者，父道也。梓者，子道也。　又桑梓，父之所樹。【詩·小雅】維桑與梓，必恭敬止。　又《梓材》《周書》篇名。古作杍材。【註】治木器曰梓，治土器曰陶，治金器曰冶。【周禮·冬官考工記】攻木之工七：輪輿弓廬匠車梓。　又【禮·曲禮】漑者不寫。【疏】杯盂之屬。亦曰梓。　又姓。梓愼，見【左傳】。　又俗謂鋟文書於板曰梓。　又一種鼠梓，名楰，江東人謂之虎梓。　又【古今註】梓實曰豫章。

梓字的源字形

梓字的起名意思

：指落叶乔木。木材可供建筑及制造器物之用。

Azusa
Basic explanation of words
Azusa
zǐ
Deciduous trees. Wood can be used for building and making utensils: Catalpa (coffin). Catalpa Palace (the emperor's coffin).
Zhimuqi: Ziren (the woodworker who made utensils in ancient times). Zi Carpenter.
Carved wood into a board for printing: Fu Zi (deliver the manuscript for typography). Zixing (x妌g).
Refers to the hometown: Zili. Sangzi.
name.
Azusa
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zǐ］
["Guangyun" means inside cutting, top stop, fine. ]
Also known as "杍1". Also known as "Tuo 1".
(1) Wooden name. Bignoniaceae, deciduous tree. The leaves are opposite or in three whorls. Flowers yellow and white. The wood is fine, light, soft, and durable. It is used for building and making furniture and musical instruments.
(2) One of the seven ancient woodworkers. Also refers to woodworking in general.
(3) Drinking vessel.
(4) The engraving of the printed book. It is called because the engraving is based on catalpa wood. Later refers to plate making and printing.
(5) Refers to the son.
(6) The name of the hometown.
(7) Ancient place names. In today's Santai County, Sichuan Province.
(8) Last name. Spring and Autumn Lu State Zi Shen. See "Zuo Zhuan · Eighteen Years of Zhao Gong".
Azusa

[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　 Zi; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 528 No. 25
[Tang Yun] 卽里切 [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Ancestor like cut [Rhyme] Zu Shi cut,? Yin 耔. [Said the text] Catalpa also. Or as?, 榟. [Tongzhi] Catalpa is similar to Catalpa. [Erya Shimu] Chair, Zi. [Guo's Note] 卽楸. 【Lu Ji·Grass and Trees sparse】The catalpa catalpa sparsely manages the white and gives birth to the catalpa. [Piya] Zi is a hundred trees long, so Hu Zi is the king of wood. Luo Yuanyun: If there is this wood in the house, the rest will not be shaken.　Hashi Azusa again. [Shang Shu·Da Chuan] The bridge person, the father is also. Zi Zhe, Zi Dao also.　Sangzi again, the tree of the father. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Wei Sang and Zi, must be respectful.　The titles of "Zicai" and "Zhou Shu". Ancient made wood. [Note] The treatment of wooden ware is called Zi, the treatment of earthenware is called pottery, and the treatment of gold is called smelting. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] Seven of Wood Attacking: Lun Yu Gonglu Carpenter Che Zi.　[Rite·Music Ceremony] Don’t write it if you take it. 【Sparse】It belongs to the cup. Yiyue Zi.　Another last name. Zi Deng, see [Zuo Zhuan].　It is also popularly said that the book is Yuban Yuezi.　Another kind of rat zi, named 楰, Jiangdong people called tiger zi.　[Annotation of Ancient and Modern] Zi Shi said Yu Zhang.

①梓树,落叶乔木,花黄白色,木质轻软可做器具,供建筑

Зная слово.
На дереве печать печати похожа на голое дерево, что означает дерево катальпа; от синь, синьбен относится к разновидности ножа, что означает, что древесина катальпы нежная и легко поддается вырезанию.
Первоначальное значение - дерево катальпа.
① Для строительства можно использовать деревья катальпы, лиственные деревья, желтые и белые цветы, светлую и мягкую древесину.
②Гравюра: одна строчка «плати ~».
~ Ремесленник ~ Ли ~ Дерево ~ Инструменты ~ Люди ~ Шуфу ~ Пел ~
